title: AI Engineer
description:
Machine Learning and Data Science, helping them develop practical skills and real-world project experience to kickstart a successful career in AI and analytics.
Role Overview
As an AI Engineer Intern, you will work on live AI projects involving data preprocessing, model training, and deployment.
Responsibilities
✅ Build and optimize ML models
✅ Work with structured and unstructured datasets
✅ Implement deep learning pipelines
Tools
TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn
Requirements
Strong fundamentals in ML and Python

title: AI Engineer
description:
We are looking for an AI Engineer to design and deploy machine learning solutions for real-world business problems.
Responsibilities
✅ Develop ML and DL models
✅ Build data pipelines
✅ Perform feature engineering
Tools
Python, PyTorch, Pandas, NumPy
Requirements
Experience with supervised and unsupervised learning

title: AI Engineer
description:
Join our AI team to build scalable machine learning systems and intelligent applications.
Responsibilities
✅ Train and evaluate ML models
✅ Deploy models using APIs
✅ Collaborate with data engineers
Tools
PyTorch, FastAPI, Docker
Requirements
Knowledge of ML lifecycle and model deployment
